title: Krampus Comes to Town
description: Hans and Helga face a nasty encounter with bully Johan as the days to Christmas count down. But bullies are not the only threat the village children face. Krampus is long overdue to pay a visit. Chickens and ducks have gone missing with hoof prints leading away. Good children like Hans and Helga have nothing to fear or do they? Johan knows he's a target. What plot is he hatching to save himself? Is Krampus smart enough to see through it?Krampus Comes to Town is a novella of treachery and sacrifice.
author: Jeff  Chapman
